Package enquiry

Class EnquiryEditor

java.lang.Object
enquiry.EnquiryEditor
public class EnquiryEditor extends Object
Methods that relate to editing Enquiries are implemented here.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryEditor

      public EnquiryEditor()

  • Method Details

    • editMenu

      public static void editMenu(Student student, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      UI for walking through a Student to edit their unanswered enquiry.
      Only the body text can be edited.
      Parameters:
      student - Student editing the enquiry
      enquiryList - List of all enquiries to save program state.

    • writeEnquiry

      public static void writeEnquiry(Student student, Camp camp, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Method that interfaces with the user to write a new Enquiry. Enquiry object is constructed and appended to enquiriesList and program state is saved.
      Parameters:
      student - Student authoring the enquiry
      camp - Camp the enquiry pertains to
      enquiryList - List of all Enquiries, to store new enquiry and save program state.

    • viewEnquiry

      public static void viewEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Prints an enquiry on-screen and its reply. If unreplied, it will state as such
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be printed

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(Enquiry e, String s, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Edits an enquiry. Edited enquiries have an extra line denoting so.
      To note that the .csv file doesn't contain the newline character,
      It has been substituted with 胡 with very low chance of collision in DataHandler.saveEnquiries.
      Parameters:
      e - Enquiry object to be edited
      s - New body text to be edited
      enquiryList - List of all enquiries, to save program state.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(Student student, Enquiry e, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Deletes an enquiry owned by the student. Enquiry is removed from Student, Camp and enquiriesList.
      Parameters:
      student - Student removing the enquiry
      e - Enquiry to be deleted
      enquiryList - List of all enquiries, to save program state.
